alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern St. Lucie and eastern Martin Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vero Beach to Saint Lucie Nuclear Power Plant to near Jonathan Dickinson State Park. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Jupiter, Walton, Fort Pierce and Stuart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin
